entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Mont-Laurier

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
